title: Computers
creator_credit: Bailey Film Productions and Victor and Ellen Landweber
brief_description: Describes the major components of a modern digital computer, and explores how the binary number system is useful in computer technology. The computer makes very rapid computations, and stores vast quantities of information.
creator_credit_for_label: Bailey Film Productions and Victor and Ellen Landweber
